tasks.label: run-backend-price-quote-check
args: "(async()=>{const http=require('http');function req(path){return new Promise((resolve,reject)=>{http.get({host:'localhost',port:3001,path},res=>{let data='';res.on('data',c=>data+=c);res.on('end',()=>resolve({statusCode:res.statusCode,body:data}));}).on('error',reject);});} (async()=>{try{const health=await req('/health'); console.log('HEALTH',health.statusCode); console.log(health.body); const quote=await req('/api/properties/1/price-quote?check_in_date=2025-11-11&check_out_date=2025-11-14'); console.log('QUOTE',quote.statusCode); console.log(quote.body); }catch(e){console.error('ERR',e.message);} })(); })()"

tasks.label: run-frontend-build-check
args: "const fs=require('fs'); const p='./Frontend/src/services/api.js'; fs.accessSync(p); console.log('Checked', p);"
